Articles.Content:
Hi, I see there isn't any options for KSP 1.3.1 version on Curseforge:

https://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods?filter-game-version=&filter-sort=updated

Yeah, it is pretty annoying that Curse(Forge) does not seem to be able to update the version numbers in a reasonable time.

This is especially bad when a mod can only run in KSP 1.3.1 and not in 1.3.0 or one has uploaded different versions for 1.3.1 and 1.3.0. but the users are not able to distinguish them.
Already had some complaints that the version they downloaded did not work with their KSP version although Curse said otherwise.

Edited October 11, 2017 by Nils277
Yes, we have raised this with Curse. Hopefully it will be addressed soon-ish.
